product_name: One Ball Jay Bio-Green Eco Leaf Wax
long_description: The One Ball Jay Bio-Green Eco Leaf wax is made from scraps and overruns at the factory. The result is a great all-temperature recycled wax. Box is also recycled. Perfect for hot waxing: drip on and smooth, scrap off when cold, brush and go ride.
short_description: The One Ball Jay Bio-Green Eco Leaf wax is made from scraps and overruns at the factory. The result is a great all-temperature recycled wax.
